short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The extension for chrome which allowed to switch between chapters in youtube player

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The extension makes it possible to quickly switch between chapters in the video thanks to hotkeys. 
Example:
- skip boring or irrelevant advertising
- skip news that is not interesting for you
- skip unnecessary feature review
- quickly find the chapter you need
